item.title: Russian Attack on Kyiv Kills 8, Ukrainian Officials Say
item.description: The assault was the deadliest on Ukraine’s capital in nearly a year. It came just hours after the Trump administration again threatened to walk away f...

item.title: Deadly Airstrikes Hit Ukraine’s Capital
item.description: The deadly overnight attack damaged buildings in Kyiv and killed at least eight people, officials said.

item.title: Victims and Eyewitnesses in Kashmir Attack Describe Scenes of Chaos and Horror
item.description: Victims and eyewitnesses described scenes of chaos and horror when militants killed 26 people in Kashmir as families, couples and friends took in a pi...

item.title: An E.U. Deforestation Rule Has Ethiopian Coffee Farmers Scrambling
item.description: The measure will require geolocation data to show that beans aren’t linked to deforestation. Farmers say they need more time to prepare.
